After seeing the current Mission Generation threads, I decided to make my own, because why not? Work in progress.

Edited August 5, 2013 by Bigcheecho
Moving this one too to the Tools and Application forums Nice work!

Moving this one too to the Tools and Application forums Nice work!

Thanks. I'm planning to add a Hard button which only contains interplanetary missions and 3 special conditions, once I find a way to make 3 different special conditons randomly select as efficiently as possible.

EDIT: 0.1.1 - Removed Kerbin from destinations in Medium difficulty

Edited August 4, 2013 by Bigcheecho

Thanks. I'm planning to add a Hard button which only contains interplanetary missions and 3 special conditions, once I find a way to make 3 different special conditons randomly select as efficiently as possible.

Hey your link isn't working for me at all, I tried it earlier today and then again just now. All I get is a blank page.

Hey your link isn't working for me at all, I tried it earlier today and then again just now. All I get is a blank page.

It's probably a bug of the website I'm using for the program, not the program itself. Therefore, I unfortunately have no control over fixing this problem. Sorry for the inconvenience.

Also, didn't you make your own mission generator?

EDIT: UPDATE 0.1.2: No more returning bases to Kerbin

Edited August 5, 2013 by Bigcheecho

It's probably a bug of the website I'm using for the program, not the program itself. Therefore, I unfortunately have no control over fixing this problem. Sorry for the inconvenience.

Also, didn't you make your own mission generator?

EDIT: UPDATE 0.1.2: No more returning bases to Kerbin

Indeed I did make my own, but I find the subject interesting so I wanted to see how you did yours. On second thought I wonder if it might be my browser...

EDIT: Sure enough it was my browser, it seems that the website doesn't like to work with Safari. Anyways nice generator, good work.
